alert.note: Alert for East Becker; Mahnomen; South Clearwater; West Becker (Minnesota) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.senderName: NWS Eastern ND and Grand Forks (Northeastern North Dakota and Northwestern Minnesota)
info.headline: Special Weather Statement issued August 08 at 4:00PM CDT by NWS Eastern ND and Grand Forks
info.description: ...A strong thunderstorm will impact portions of southern Mahnomen, northwestern Becker and south central Clearwater Counties through 430 PM CDT... At 400 PM CDT, Doppler radar was tracking a strong thunderstorm near Waubun, or 23 miles north of Detroit Lakes, moving east at 40 mph. HAZARD...Winds in excess of 40 mph and penny size hail. SOURCE...Radar indicated. IMPACT...Gusty winds could knock down tree limbs and blow around unsecured objects. Minor damage to outdoor objects is possible. Locations impacted include... Waubun, Tulaby Lake, Ogema, Many Point Lake and White Earth. MAX HAIL SIZE...0.75 IN MAX WIND GUST...40 MPH
info.instruction: If outdoors, consider seeking shelter inside a building.

area.areaDesc: East Becker; Mahnomen; South Clearwater; West Becker
